channel.title: Goudont 659 V2 Release soon
channel.description:
UPDATES;
- [b]Convert to 666[/b] - [b]Add new quests[/b] - [b]Add a new minigame[/b]
YOU'RE GONNA HAVE TO USE MY CLIENT FOR ALL THE LOYALTY TITLES TO BE SEEN
NEW FEATURES:
- [B]STAFF, DONATOR, VOTE CAPES[/B] (The new capes that you achieve when you get all 99 stats, I changed it to staff/achievment capes, but you can remove if you want)
- [B]UPDATED TUTORIAL ISLAND (fully complete)[/B]
- [B]Same home as V1[/B]
- [B]Updated welcome to *SERVERNAME* screen[/B]
- [B]UPDATED WELCOME TO *SERVERNAME* MESSAGE[/B]
- [B]INTERACTION RESPONSE WITH ANY OBJECT[/B] -- (if the object is not added, a message is sent saying "I can't do that at the moment." -- For players only, if admin, then it tells you information about the object (example: OBJECT ID, COORDS))
- [B]More dialogues (The pre-spawned npcs {like HANS or THESSALIA} talk to you[/B]
- [B]Level 120 skills max[/B]
- [B]Max 168 combat[/B]
- [B]AUTO DEMOTION SYSTEM[/B] (If your staff is inactive, they get demoted automatically)
- [B]REPORT ABUSE SYSTEM[/B] (::reportabuse (playername) (Details)
- [B]POINT SHOPS[/B] (Donator points, vote points, reward points... etc)
- [B]Right-Click Option Change[/B] (When you right click a player, the "Follow, Trade" have been coloured and little icons to represent the word have been added.)
And thanks to : - Kennelz, Jumper, and Kesen (for teaching me how to code smaller deobs, teaching me the basics...) - Mezzyscape owner (For his source)
WILL BE UPDATED daily

item.title: Goudont 659 V2 Release soon
item.dc:creator: @goudont goudont
item.description:
@goudont wrote:

UPDATES;

  • Convert to 666
  • Add new quests
  • Add a new minigame

YOU’RE GONNA HAVE TO USE MY CLIENT FOR ALL THE LOYALTY TITLES TO BE SEEN

NEW FEATURES:

  • STAFF, DONATOR, VOTE CAPES (The new capes that you achieve when you get all 99 stats, I changed it to staff/achievment capes, but you can remove if you want)

  • UPDATED TUTORIAL ISLAND (fully complete)

  • Same home as V1

  • Updated welcome to SERVERNAME screen

  • UPDATED WELCOME TO SERVERNAME MESSAGE

  • INTERACTION RESPONSE WITH ANY OBJECT – (if the object is not added, a message is sent saying “I can’t do that at the moment.” – For players only, if admin, then it tells you information about the object (example: OBJECT ID, COORDS))

  • More dialogues (The pre-spawned npcs {like HANS or THESSALIA} talk to you

  • Level 120 skills max

  • Max 168 combat

  • AUTO DEMOTION SYSTEM (If your staff is inactive, they get demoted automatically)

  • REPORT ABUSE SYSTEM (::reportabuse (playername) (Details)

  • POINT SHOPS (Donator points, vote points, reward points… etc)

  • Right-Click Option Change (When you right click a player, the “Follow, Trade” have been coloured and little icons to represent the word have been added.)

And thanks to :

  • Kennelz, Jumper, and Kesen (for teaching me how to code smaller deobs, teaching me the basics…)
  • Mezzyscape owner (For his source)

WILL BE UPDATED daily
